# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 数据丢失防护包括许多可供 DLP 策略使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-106">本文列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并演示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-108">确证性证据（如关键字和校验和）可用于标识敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-113">敏感信息类型用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="9710e-116">保留标签</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-116">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="9710e-117">通信合规性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="9710e-118">自动标记策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-119">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-120">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-121">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-122">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-123">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-124">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-125">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-126">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-127">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-128">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-129">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-133">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-134">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-135">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-136">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-137">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-143">abarouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-143">abarouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-144">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-144">abaroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-147">bankrouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-147">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-148">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-148">bankroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-150">routing no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-150">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-151">路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-151">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-152">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-152">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-153">routing#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-153">routing#</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-155">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-157">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-159">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-160">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-161">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-162">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-163">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-164">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-165">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-166">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-167">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-168">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-169">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-170">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-182">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-184">具有或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-186">帐户号码是 6 到 10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-187">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-189">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-190">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-194">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-195">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-196">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-197">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-198">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-198">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-199">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-200">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-205">base currency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-205">base currency</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-206">usa account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-206">usa account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-207">holder address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-207">holder address</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-216">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-216">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-217">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-218">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-218">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-219">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-219">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-220">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-220">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-221">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-221">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-222">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-223">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-224">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-225">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-226">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-227">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-228">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-229">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-230">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-231">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-232">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-233">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-235">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-237">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-238">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-239">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-240">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-241">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-251">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-251">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-252">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-253">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-254">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-255">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-256">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-257">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-259">九个数字（带分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-260">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-261">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-262">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-263">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-264">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-265">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-266">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-268">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-270">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-271">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-272">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-273">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-274">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-277">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-277">acn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-279">australia company no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-279">australia company no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-282">澳大利亚公司否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-282">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-283">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-283">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-284">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-286">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-288">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-289">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-290">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-291">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-292">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-293">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-294">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-295">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-296">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-298">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-300">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-301">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-302">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-303">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-403">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-405">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-407">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-408">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-408">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-409">九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-409">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-410">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-410">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-411">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-411">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-412">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-413">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-414">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-415">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-416">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-417">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-418">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-419">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-419">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-421">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-421">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-422">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-422">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-423">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-423">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-424">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-424">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-425">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-425">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-426">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-426">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-427">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-427">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-428">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-428">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-429">一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-429">medicare</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-430">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-432">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-433">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-434">字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-435">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-436">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-437">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-438">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-439">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-440">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-474">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-476">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-478">通常用空格显示八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-479">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-480">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-481">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-482">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-483">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-487">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-488">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-489">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-490">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-493">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-493">australian business number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-495">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-495">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-496">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-496">portfolio number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-502">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-504">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-505">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-506">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-510">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-511">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-512">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-639">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-640">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-641">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-642">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-643">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-644">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-645">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-646">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-647">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-648">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-649">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="9710e-650">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-651">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-653">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-655">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-656">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-657">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-658">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-660">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-662">personalaus一sich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-663">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-665">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-667">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-668">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-669">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-670">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-672">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-674">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-675">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-676">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-677">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-678">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-679">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-680">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-694">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-694">reisepassnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-704">奥地利社会保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-704">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-705">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-706">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-706">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-707">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-708">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-708">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-709">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-709">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-710">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-710">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-711">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-711">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-712">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-713">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-713">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-714">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-715">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-715">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-716">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-717">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-717">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-718">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-719">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-719">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-745">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-745">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-747">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-747">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-748">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-749">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-749">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-750">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-750">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-751">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-751">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-752">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-752">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-753">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-753">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-754">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-754">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-755">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-756">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-756">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-757">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-758">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-758">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-759">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-760">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-760">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-761">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-761">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-762">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-762">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-785">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-785">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-786">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-786">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-787">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-787">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-788">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-788">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-789">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-789">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-790">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-790">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-791">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-791">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-793">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-793">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-795">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-795">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-796">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-796">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-797">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-797">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-798">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-798">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-799">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-799">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-800">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-800">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-801">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-801">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-802">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-802">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-803">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-803">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-804">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-804">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-805">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-805">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-806">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-807">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-808">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-809">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-809">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-810">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-811">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-811">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-812">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-812">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-813">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-813">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-831">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-831">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-832">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-833">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-833">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-834">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-834">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-835">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-835">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-836">3-200 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-836">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-837">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-837">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-838">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-838">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-839">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-840">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-841">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-842">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-843">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-843">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-844">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-845">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-845">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-860">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-860">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-861">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-861">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-862">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-862">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-863">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-863">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-864">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-864">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-865">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-865">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-867">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-867">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-868">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-868">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-869">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-869">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-870">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-870">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-871">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-871">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-872">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-872">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-873">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-873">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-874">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-874">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-875">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-875">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-876">1-300 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-876">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-877">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-877">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-878">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-878">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-879">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-879">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-880">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-880">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-881">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-881">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-882">分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-882">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-884">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-884">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-886">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-886">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-887">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-887">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-888">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-888">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-903">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-903">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-915">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-915">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-916">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-916">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-917">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-917">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-918">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-918">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-919">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-919">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-920">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-920">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-921">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-921">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-922">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-923">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-924">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-925">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-926">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-926">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-927">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-927">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-969">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-969">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-970">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-971">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-971">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-972">net"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-972">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-973">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-974">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-974">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-975">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-975">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-976">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-976">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-977">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-977">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-978">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-978">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-979">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-979">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-980">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-980">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-981">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-981">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-982">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-982">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-983">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-984">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-985">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-986">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-986">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-987">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-987">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-988">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-988">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
