## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1003">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1003">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1005">字符串"sig"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1005">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1007">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1007">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1008">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1008">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1009">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1009">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1010">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1010">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1011">小写或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1011">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1012">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1012">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1013">任何不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1013">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1014">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1015">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1015">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1016">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1017">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1017">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1018">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1018">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1029">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1029">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1030">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1030">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1031">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1031">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1032">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1032">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1033">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1033">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1034">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1035">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1035">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1036">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1036">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1037">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1037">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1038">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1039">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1039">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1040">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1041">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1041">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1042">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1042">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1043">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1043">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1058">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1058">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1060">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1060">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1061">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1062">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1062">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1063">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1063">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1064">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1064">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1065">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1066">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1066">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1067">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1067">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1068">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1069">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1069">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1070">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1071">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1071">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1072">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1072">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1073">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1074">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1074">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1075">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1076">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1076">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1077">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1077">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1078">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1078">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1079">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1079">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1097">Azure 存储帐户密钥 (通用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1097">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1098">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1099">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1099">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1100">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1100">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1101">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1101">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1102">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1102">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1103">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1103">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1104">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1105">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1106">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1107">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1108">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1108">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1109">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1109">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1110">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1111">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1111">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1112">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1112">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1113">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1113">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1114">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1115">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1116">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1117">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1117">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1118">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1118">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1119">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1119">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1252">比利时国家号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1252">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1253">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1254">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1254">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1255">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1256">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1256">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1257">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。出生日期的 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1257">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1258">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1258">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1259">三个连续的数字 (男性为奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1259">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1260">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1260">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1261">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1261">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1262">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1263">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1263">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1264">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1265">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1266">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1266">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1267">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1267">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1268">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1269">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1269">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1270">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1270">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1271">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1271">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1330">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1330">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1332">两个字母后跟 6 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1332">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1334">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1334">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1336">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1336">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1337">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1338">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1339">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1340">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1341">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1341">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1342">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1342">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1343">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1343">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1344">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1344">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1371">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1371">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1372">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1373">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1374">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1375">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1376">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1377">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1379">12 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1379">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1381">12 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1381">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1382">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1382">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1383">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1383">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1384">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1384">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1385">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1385">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1386">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1386">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1387">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1387">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1388">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1388">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1389">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1389">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1390">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1391">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1391">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1392">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1393">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1394">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1394">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1395">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1395">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1396">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1397">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1397">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1398">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1399">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1399">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1400">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1400">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1401">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1401">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1402">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1402">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1403">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1403">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1404">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1404">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1405">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1405">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1406">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1406">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1407">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1407">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1408">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1408">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1409">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1409">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1411">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1411">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1412">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1413">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1413">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1414">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1415">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1415">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1416">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1417">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1417">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1418">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1418">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1419">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1419">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1420">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1420">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1421">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1421">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1422">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1422">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1424">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1424">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1426">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1427">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1427">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1428">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1428">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1429">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1429">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1430">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1430">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1431">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1431">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1432">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1432">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1434">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1434">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1438">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1438">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1439">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1439">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1440">中年</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1440">Imposto</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1444">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1444">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1445">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1446">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1446">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1447">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1448">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1448">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1449">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1449">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1450">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1450">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1451">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1451">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1452">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1452">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1453">三个数字 (前八个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1453">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1454">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1454">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1455">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1455">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1456">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1456">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1457">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1457">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1458">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1459">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1459">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1460">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1461">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1462">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1462">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1463">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1463">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1464">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1464">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1465">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1466">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1466">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1467">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1489">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1489">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1491">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1491">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1492">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1492">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1493">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1494">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1494">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1495">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1495">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1496">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1496">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1497">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1497">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1498">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1498">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1499">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1499">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1500">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1500">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1501">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1501">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1502">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1502">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1503">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1503">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1504">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1505">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1505">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1506">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1507">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1507">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1508">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1509">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1509">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1510">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1510">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1511">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1511">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1512">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1515">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1515">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1516">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1516">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1517">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1517">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1518">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1518">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1519">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1519">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1520">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1520">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1521">RG (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1521">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1522">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1522">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1523">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1523">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1524">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1525">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1525">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1527">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1527">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1528">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1529">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1530">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1531">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1531">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1532">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1532">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1533">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1533">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1660">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1660">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1661">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1661">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1662">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1662">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1663">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1663">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1664">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1664">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1665">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1665">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1666">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1666">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1668">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1668">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1669">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1670">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1670">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1671">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1671">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1672">两个数字，对应于出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1672">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1673">对应于性别的一个数字：男性的偶数位数和男性的奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1673">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1674">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1674">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1675">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1676">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1676">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1677">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1678">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1678">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1679">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1679">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1680">找到 的  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1680">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1681">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1681">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1682">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1682">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1727">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1727">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1728">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1729">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1729">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1730">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1730">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1731">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1731">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1732">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1732">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1733">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1733">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1734">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1734">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1735">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1735">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1736">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1736">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1737">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1737">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1738">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1738">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1739">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1739">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1740">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1740">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1741">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1761">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1761">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1763">7 个或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1763">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1764">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1765">加拿大银行帐号是 7 个或 12 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1765">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1766">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1766">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1767">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1767">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1768">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1769">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1769">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1770">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1770">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1771">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1771">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1772">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1773">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1773">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1774">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1775">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1775">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1776">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1776">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1777">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1777">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1778">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1778">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1779">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1780">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1781">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1805">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1805">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1807">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1807">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1809">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1809">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1811">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1811">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1813">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1814">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1814">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1815">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1815">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1816">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1816">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1817">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1817">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1818">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1818">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1819">省/市/自治区的缩写，例如 AB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1819">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1820">省名称，例如 Alberta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1820">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1821">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1821">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1822">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1822">DL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1823">DLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1823">DLS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1824">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1824">CDL</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1952">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1952">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1953">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1954">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1954">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1955">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1956">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1956">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1957">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1958">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1959">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1960">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1961">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1961">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1962">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1962">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1974">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1974">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1975">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1976">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1976">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1977">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1978">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1978">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1979">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1980">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1980">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-1981">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-1982">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1983">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1983">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-1984">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-1984">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2014">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2014">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2015">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2018">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2018">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2020">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2022">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2022">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2023">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2023">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2024">至少找到了两个来自Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2024">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2057">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2057">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2058">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2059">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2059">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2061">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2061">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2062">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2062">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2063">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2063">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2064">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2064">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2065">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2065">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2066">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2066">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2067">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2067">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2068">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2069">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2069">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2070">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2071">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2072">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2072">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2073">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2073">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2074">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2075">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2076">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2076">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2077">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2077">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2078">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2078">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2079">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2079">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2080">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2080">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2081">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
