## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2106">智利身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2106">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2108">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2108">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2110">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2110">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2111">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2111">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2112">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2112">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2113">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2113">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2114">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2114">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2115">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2115">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2116">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2116">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2117">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2117">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2119">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2121">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2122">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2122">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2123">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2123">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2124">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2125">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2126">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2127">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2127">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2164">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2164">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2166">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2166">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2167">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2168">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2168">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2169">六个数字，表示地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2169">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2170">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2170">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2171">三个数字，表示订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2171">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2172">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2172">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2173">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2174">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2175">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2176">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2176">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2177">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2177">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2178">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2178">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2179">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2179">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2180">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2181">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2182">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2182">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2183">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2183">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2184">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2184">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2185">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2185">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2186">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2186">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2187">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2187">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2188">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2188">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2189">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2189">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2190">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2190">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2191">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2191">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2192">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2192">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2193">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2193">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2194">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2194">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2195">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2195">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2197">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2197">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2199">复杂而强大的模式，用于检测全球所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和第三者卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2199">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2201">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2201">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2203">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2204">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2204">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2205">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2205">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2206">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2206">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2207">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2207">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2208">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2208">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2209">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2210">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2210">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2211">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2212">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2472">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2472">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2474">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2474">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2475">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2476">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2476">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2477">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2477">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2478">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2478">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2479">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2479">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2480">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2481">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2481">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2482">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2482">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2606">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2606">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2607">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2607">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2608">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2608">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2610">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2610">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2611">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2612">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2612">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2613">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2614">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2615">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2616">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2617">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2617">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2618">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2618">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2649">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2649">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2651">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2651">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2653">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2653">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2654">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2654">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2655">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2655">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2656">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2656">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2657">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2657">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2658">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2658">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2659">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2659">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2660">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2660">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2661">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2662">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2663">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2681">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2683">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2685">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2686">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2686">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2687">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2689">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2691">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2691">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2692">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2693">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2694">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2695">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2696">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2697">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2698">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2698">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2699">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2699">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2700">majstorski broj gragragraana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2700">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2701">master citizen number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2701">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2702">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2702">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2703">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2703">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2728">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2728">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2729">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2729">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2730">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2730">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2731">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2732">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2732">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2733">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2734">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2734">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2735">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2736">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2737">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2737">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2738">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2738">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2863">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2863">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2864">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2864">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2865">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2865">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2866">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2866">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2867">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2867">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2868">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2868">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2869">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2869">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2870">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2871">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2871">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2872">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2873">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2873">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2874">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2875">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2875">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2876">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2877">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2878">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2878">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2879">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2879">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2880">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2880">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2881">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2881">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2882">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2882">id card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2884">kim且 karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2884">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2885">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2885">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2886">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2886">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2888">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2888">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2889">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2890">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2890">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2891">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2892">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2892">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2893">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2894">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2894">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2895">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2896">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2896">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2897">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2897">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2898">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2898">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2899">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2899">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2900">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2901">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2901">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2902">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2902">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2931">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2931">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2932">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2932">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2933">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2933">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2934">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2934">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2935">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2935">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2936">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2936">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2937">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2937">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2939">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2939">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2941">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2941">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2942">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2942">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2943">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2943">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2944">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2944">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2945">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2946">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2946">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2947">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2948">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2948">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2949">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2949">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2950">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2950">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2951">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2952">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2952">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2980">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2980">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2981">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2982">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2982">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2983">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2984">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2984">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2985">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2985">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2986">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2986">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2987">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2987">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2988">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2988">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2989">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2990">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2990">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-2991">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-2992">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2992">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2993">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2993">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-2994">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-2994">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3120">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3120">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3122">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3122">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3123">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3124">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3124">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3125">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3126">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3126">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3127">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3128">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3128">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3129">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3129">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3130">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3130">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3131">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3131">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3132">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3132">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3133">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3133">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3134">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3134">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3156">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3156">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3157">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3158">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3158">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3159">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3160">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3160">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3161">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3161">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3162">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3162">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3163">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3163">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3164">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3164">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3165">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3165">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3166">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3166">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3167">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3167">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3168">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3169">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3169">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3170">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3171">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3172">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3172">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3173">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3173">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3174">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3175">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3176">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3176">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3177">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3178">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3178">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_czech_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3179">Keyword_czech_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3179">Keyword_czech_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3224">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3224">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3225">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3225">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3226">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3226">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3227">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3227">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3228">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3228">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3229">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3230">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3230">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3231">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3232">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3232">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3233">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3233">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3234">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3234">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3358">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3358">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3359">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3360">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3360">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3361">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3362">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3362">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3363">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3364">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3364">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3365">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3366">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3367">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3367">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3368">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3368">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3369">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 找到的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3369">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3370">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3370">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3371">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3371">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3372">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3372">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3392">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3392">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3394">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3394">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3396">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3396">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3397">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3397">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3398">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3398">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3399">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3399">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3401">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3403">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3404">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3404">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3405">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3405">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3406">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3406">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3407">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3407">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3408">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3408">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3409">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3409">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3481">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3481">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3482">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3483">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3483">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3484">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3485">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3485">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3486">一个字母 (可能) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3486">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3487">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3487">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3488">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3488">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3489">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3490">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3490">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3491">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3492">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3492">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3493">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3493">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3494">找到的 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3494">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3495">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3495">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3496">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3496">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3497">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3497">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3498">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3498">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3499">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3499">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3500">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3500">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3501">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3501">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3502">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3502">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3503">一些强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3503">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3504">犯罪管制机构</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3504">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3505">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3505">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3507">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3507">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3509">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3509">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3510">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3510">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3511">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3511">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3513">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3513">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3515">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3515">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3516">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3516">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3517">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3517">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3643">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3643">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3644">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3644">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3645">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3645">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3646">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3646">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3647">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3647">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3648">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3648">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3649">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3649">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3651">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3651">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3653">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3653">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3654">一个数字，对应于性生活和年龄 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3654">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3655">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3655">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3656">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期的分隔人的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3656">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3657">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3657">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3659">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3659">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3661">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3661">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3662">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3662">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3663">找到 的  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3663">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3664">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3664">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3665">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3665">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3666">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3666">Keywords</span></span>
