## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3698">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3698">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3699">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3699">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3700">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3700">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3701">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3701">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3702">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3702">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3704">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3704">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3707">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3707">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3708">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3709">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3709">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3710">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3711">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3711">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3712">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3712">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3730">欧盟借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3730">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3732">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3732">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3733">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3734">复杂而可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3734">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3735">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3736">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3736">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-3737">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-3738">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3738">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3739">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3739">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3740">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3740">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3741">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3741">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3742">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3742">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3743">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3743">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3744">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3744">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3745">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3745">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-3746">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-3746">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4193">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4193">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4194">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4195">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4195">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4196">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4197">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4197">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4198">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4198">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4199">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4199">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4200">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4201">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4201">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4202">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4202">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4203">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4203">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4204">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4204">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4205">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4205">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4206">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4206">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4207">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4207">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4338">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4338">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4339">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4339">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4340">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4340">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4341">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4341">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4342">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4342">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4343">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4343">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4344">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4344">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4345">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4346">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4346">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4347">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4348">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4348">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4349">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4349">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4350">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4350">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4351">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4351">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4352">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4353">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4354">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4355">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4356">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4356">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4357">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4357">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4375">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4375">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4377">六个数字加一个字符，表示一世纪加三个数字加一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4377">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4378">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4379">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4379">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4380">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4380">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4381">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4381">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4382">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4382">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4383">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4383">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4384">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4385">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4385">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4386">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4388">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4388">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4389">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4389">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4390">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4390">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4391">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4391">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4392">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4392">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4393">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4393">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4442">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4442">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4443">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4443">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4444">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4445">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4445">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4446">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4446">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4447">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4447">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4448">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4449">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4449">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4450">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4451">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4452">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4453">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4453">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4454">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4454">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4455">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4455">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4456">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4456">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4457">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4457">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4458">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4458">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4459">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4459">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4483">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4483">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4484">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4484">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4486">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4486">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4488">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4488">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4489">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4490">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4490">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4491">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4492">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4492">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4493">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4493">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4494">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4494">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4621">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4621">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4622">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4622">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4623">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4623">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4624">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4624">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4625">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4625">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4626">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4626">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4627">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4627">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4628">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4629">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4629">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4630">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4631">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4631">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4632">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4632">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4633">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4633">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4634">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4634">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4635">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4635">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4636">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4636">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4637">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4638">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4639">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4640">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4640">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4641">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4641">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4642">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4642">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4643">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4643">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4644">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4644">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4645">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4645">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4646">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4646">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4647">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4647">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4648">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4648">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4649">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4650">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4650">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4651">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4652">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4652">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4653">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4654">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4655">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4656">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4657">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4657">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4658">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4658">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4659">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4659">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4660">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4660">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4661">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4661">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4662">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4662">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4663">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4663">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4664">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4664">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4665">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4665">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4666">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4666">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4667">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4667">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4668">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4668">national identity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4671">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4671">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4672">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4672">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4673">欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中提供了此敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4673">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4674">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4674">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4675">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4676">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4676">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4677">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4678">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4678">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4679">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4679">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4680">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4680">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4681">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4681">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4682">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4683">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4684">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4685">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4686">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4686">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4687">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4687">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4688">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4688">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4689">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4690">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4690">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4691">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4691">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4722">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4722">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4724">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4724">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4725">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4726">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4726">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4727">13 个数字，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4727">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4728">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4728">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4729">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4729">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4730">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4731">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4732">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4734">函数 `Func_french_insee` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4734">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4735">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4735">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4736">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4737">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4738">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4738">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4739">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4770">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4770">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4772">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4772">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4773">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4774">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4774">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4775">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4775">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4776">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4776">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4777">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4777">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4778">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4778">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4779">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4779">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4780">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4780">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4781">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4781">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4782">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4782">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4783">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4783">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4784">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4784">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4785">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4786">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4786">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4787">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4788">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4789">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4789">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4790">找到 的  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4790">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4791">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4792">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4792">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4812">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4812">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4813">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4813">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4814">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4814">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4815">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4815">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4816">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4816">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4817">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4817">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4818">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4818">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4820">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4820">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4822">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4822">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4823">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4823">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4824">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4824">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4825">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4825">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4826">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4826">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4827">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4827">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4828">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4828">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4829">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4829">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4830">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4830">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4831">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4831">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4832">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4833">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4833">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4834">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4835">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4836">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4836">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4837">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4837">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4838">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4839">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4839">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4852">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4852">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4853">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4853">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4854">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4854">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4855">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4856">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4856">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4857">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4858">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4858">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4859">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4859">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4860">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4860">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4861">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4861">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4862">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4862">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4863">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4863">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4864">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4865">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4865">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-4866">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-4867">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4867">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4868">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4868">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4869">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4869">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-4870">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-4870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5019">德国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5019">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5020">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5021">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5021">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5022">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5022">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5023">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5024">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5024">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5025">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5025">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5026">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5026">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5027">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5027">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5028">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5028">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5029">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5029">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5030">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5030">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5031">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5031">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5032">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5032">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5033">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5033">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5034">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5034">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5035">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5035">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5036">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5036">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5037">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5037">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5038">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5038">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5039">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5039">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5040">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5040">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5041">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5041">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5044">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5044">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5045">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5045">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5046">personalaus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5046">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5047">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5047">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5048">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5048">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5049">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5049">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5050">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5050">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5051">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5051">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5053">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5053">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5054">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5055">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5055">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5056">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5056">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5057">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5057">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5058">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5058">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5059">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5059">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5060">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5061">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5062">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5063">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5064">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5064">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5065">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5065">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5066">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5067">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5068">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5068">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5069">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5069">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5070">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5070">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5083">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5083">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5093">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5093">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5094">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5094">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5095">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5095">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5096">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5096">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5097">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5097">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5098">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5098">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5099">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5099">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5100">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5100">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5101">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5101">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5102">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5102">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5103">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5103">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5104">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5104">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5105">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5105">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5106">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5107">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5107">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5109">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5110">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5110">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5111">找到 的  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5111">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5112">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5113">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5113">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5139">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5139">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5140">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5140">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5141">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5141">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5142">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5142">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5143">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5143">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5144">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5144">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5145">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5145">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5146">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5147">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5147">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5148">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5149">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5149">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5150">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5150">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5151">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5151">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5152">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5154">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5154">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5155">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5155">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5156">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5156">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5157">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5157">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5159">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5161">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5162">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5162">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5163">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5163">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5164">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5165">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5165">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5166">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5166">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5167">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5167">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5168">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5168">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5169">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5169">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5170">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5170">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5171">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5171">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5172">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5172">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5173">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5173">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5174">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5174">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5175">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5175">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5176">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5176">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5178">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5178">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5180">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5180">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5182">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5184">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5185">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5185">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5186">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
