## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5312">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5312">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5313">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5314">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5314">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5315">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5316">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5316">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5317">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5317">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5318">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5318">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5319">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5319">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5320">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5320">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5321">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5321">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5322">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5322">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5323">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5323">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5324">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5325">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5325">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5326">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5327">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5328">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5328">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5329">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5329">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5330">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5330">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5331">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5331">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5332">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5332">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5333">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5333">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5334">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5334">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5335">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5335">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5336">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5336">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5337">希腊语政府 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5337">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5338">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5338">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5339">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5339">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5340">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5340">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5341">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5341">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5342">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5342">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5344">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5344">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5346">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5346">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5347">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5348">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5348">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5349">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5350">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5350">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5351">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5351">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5352">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5352">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5353">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 找到关键字 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5353">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5354">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5354">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5355">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5355">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5356">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5356">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5361">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5361">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5362">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5362">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5367">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5367">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5368">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5368">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5369">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5369">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5370">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5370">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5371">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5371">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5372">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5372">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5373">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5373">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5374">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5374">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5375">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5375">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5376">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5376">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5377">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5377">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5378">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5378">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5379">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5379">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5380">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5380">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5381">无空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5381">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5382">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5382">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5383">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5383">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5384">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5384">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5385">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5385">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5386">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5387">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5388">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5389">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5390">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5390">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5391">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5391">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5392">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5392">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5393">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5393">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5399">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5399">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5403">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5403">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5404">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5404">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5405">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5406">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5407">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5408">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5409">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5410">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5412">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5412">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5414">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5414">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5416">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5416">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5418">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5418">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5419">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5419">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5420">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5420">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5449">Hk Kong identity card (HKID) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5449">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5450">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5451">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5451">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5452">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5453">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5453">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5454">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5454">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5455">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5455">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5456">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5456">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5458">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5460">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5460">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5461">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5461">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5462">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5462">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5463">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5463">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5464">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5464">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5465">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5465">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5466">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5466">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5472">id card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5472">id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5473">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5473">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5506">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5506">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5507">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5507">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5508">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5508">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5509">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5509">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5510">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5510">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5511">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5511">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5512">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5512">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5513">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5514">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5514">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5515">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5516">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5516">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5517">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5517">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5518">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5518">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5643">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5643">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5644">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5644">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5645">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5645">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5646">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5646">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5647">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5647">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5648">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5648">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5649">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5649">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5651">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5651">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5653">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5653">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5654">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2-男性，对于在 1900 之前年龄的男性或具有双重公民关系) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5654">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5655">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5655">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5656">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5656">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5657">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5657">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5659">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5659">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5661">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5661">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5662">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5662">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5663">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5663">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5664">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5664">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5665">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5665">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5666">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5666">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5667">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5667">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5668">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5668">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5669">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5669">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5670">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5670">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5671">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5671">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5672">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5672">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5673">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5673">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5674">személyazonosító igazolv一y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5674">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5675">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5675">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5676">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5676">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5677">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5678">两个字母后跟 6 个或 7 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5678">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5679">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5680">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5680">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5681">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5682">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5682">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5683">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5684">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5684">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5685">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5685">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5686">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5687">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5687">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5688">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5689">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5689">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5690">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5690">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5708">发行日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5708">date of issue</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5710">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5710">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5711">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5712">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5712">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5713">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5714">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5714">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5716">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5716">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5718">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5719">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5719">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5720">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5720">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5721">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5722">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5722">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5742">匈牙利税收标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5742">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5743">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5743">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5744">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5744">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5745">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5745">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5746">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5746">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5747">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5747">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5748">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5748">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5749">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5750">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5750">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5751">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5752">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5752">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5753">一个数字必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5753">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5754">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5754">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5755">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5755">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5757">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5759">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5759">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5760">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5760">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5761">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5761">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5762">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5763">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5763">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5789">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5789">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5790">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5790">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5791">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5791">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5792">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5792">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5793">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5793">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5794">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5794">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5795">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5795">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5796">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5797">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5797">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5798">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5799">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5799">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5800">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5800">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5801">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5801">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5802">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5802">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5803">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5804">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5805">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5807">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5807">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5808">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5808">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5809">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5810">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5810">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5811">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5811">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5812">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5812">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5813">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5813">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5814">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5814">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5815">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5815">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5816">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5816">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5817">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5817">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5818">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5818">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5819">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5819">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5820">kázósségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5820">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5821">által一os forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5821">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5822">hozzáadott一ték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5822">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5823">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5823">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5824">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5824">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5826">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5826">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5828">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5828">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5829">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5829">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5830">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5830">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5831">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5831">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5832">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5832">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5833">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5833">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5834">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5835">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5835">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5836">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5837">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5837">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5838">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5838">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5839">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5839">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5840">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5840">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5841">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5841">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5842">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5842">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5843">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5843">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5844">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5844">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5845">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5845">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5846">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5846">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5848">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5848">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5849">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5850">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5850">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5851">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5851">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5852">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5852">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5853">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5853">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5854">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5854">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5855">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5855">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5856">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5856">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5857">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5857">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5858">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5858">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5859">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5859">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5860">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5860">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5861">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5861">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5862">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5862">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5863">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5863">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5864">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5864">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5865">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5865">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5866">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5866">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5868">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5868">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5873">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5873">आधार</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5875">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5875">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5877">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5877">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5878">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5879">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5879">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5880">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5880">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5881">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5881">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5882">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5882">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5883">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5883">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5884">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5884">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5885">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5885">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5886">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5886">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5887">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5887">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5888">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5889">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5889">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5890">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5891">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5891">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5892">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5892">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5893">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5893">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5894">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5894">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5895">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5895">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5896">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5896">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5897">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5897">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5898">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5898">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5899">国际银行帐号 (IBAN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5899">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5900">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5901">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5901">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5902">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5903">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5903">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5904">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5904">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5905">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5905">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5906">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5906">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5907">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5907">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-p137">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-p137">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5910">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5910">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5911">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5912">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5912">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5913">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5914">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5914">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5915">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5915">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5916">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5916">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5917">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5917">Keywords</span></span>
