## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5919">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5919">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5920">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5921">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5921">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5922">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5923">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5923">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5924">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5925">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5926">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5927">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5928">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5928">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5929">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5929">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5930">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5930">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5931">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5931">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5932">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5932">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5933">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_updated分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5933">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5934">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5934">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5935">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_codes分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 关键字词典的任何术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5935">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5936">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5936">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5937">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5937">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5939">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5939">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5941">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5941">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5942">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5943">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5943">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5944">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5945">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5946">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5946">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5947">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5947">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5948">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5948">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5949">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5949">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5950">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5950">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5951">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_updated分类、第九次修订、修订修改和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (关键字词典) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5951">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5952">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5952">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5953">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_codes分类、第九次修订、修订和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (的关键字词典中的) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5953">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5954">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5954">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5955">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5955">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5956">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5956">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5957">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5957">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5958">处理 IPv4 地址 (格式) 和无格式 (IPv4) 句点的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5958">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5959">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5959">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5960">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5960">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5961">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5961">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5962">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5963">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5963">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5964">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5965">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5965">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5966">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5966">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5967">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5967">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5968">对于 IPv4，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5968">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5969">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5969">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5970">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5970">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5971">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5971">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5972">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5972">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5973">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5973">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5974">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5974">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5975">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5975">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5976">此 (的 IP 关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5976">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5977">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5977">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5978">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5978">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5979">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5979">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5980">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5980">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5981">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5981">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5983">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5983">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5984">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5985">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5985">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5986">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5986">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5987">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5987">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5988">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5989">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5989">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-5990">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-5991">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5991">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5992">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5992">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-5993">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-5993">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6114">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6114">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6115">ceadúnas tiom在a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6115">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6116">ceadúnais tiom一a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6116">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6117">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6117">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6118">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6119">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6119">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6120">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6121">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6121">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6122">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6122">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6123">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6123">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6125">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6127">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6127">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6128">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6128">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6129">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6129">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6130">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6130">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6131">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6131">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6132">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6132">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6133">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6133">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6134">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6134">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6157">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6157">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6158">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6159">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6159">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6160">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6160">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6161">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6161">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6162">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6162">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6163">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6164">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6164">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6165">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6165">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6166">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6166">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6167">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6167">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6168">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6168">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6169">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6169">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6170">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6170">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6171">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6171">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6172">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6172">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6173">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6173">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6174">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6174">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6175">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6175">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6176">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6176">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6177">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6178">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6178">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6179">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6179">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6180">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6180">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6225">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6225">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6226">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6226">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6227">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6227">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6228">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6228">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6229">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6229">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6230">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6230">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6231">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6231">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6232">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6233">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6233">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6234">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6234">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6235">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6235">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6236">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6236">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6237">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6238">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6239">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6240">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6241">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6241">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6242">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6242">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6243">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6243">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6244">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6244">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6245">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6245">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6246">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6246">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6247">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6247">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6248">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6248">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6249">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6249">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6250">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6251">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6251">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6252">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6253">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6253">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6254">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6255">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6256">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6257">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6257">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6258">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6258">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6259">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6259">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6260">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6260">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6279">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6279">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6280">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6280">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6282">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6282">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6283">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6284">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6284">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6285">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6285">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6286">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6286">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6287">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6287">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6288">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6288">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6289">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6290">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6290">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6291">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6292">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6292">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6293">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6293">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6294">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6294">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6421">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6421">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6422">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6422">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6423">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6423">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6424">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6424">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6425">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6425">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6426">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6426">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6427">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6427">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6428">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6428">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6429">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6429">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6430">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6430">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6431">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6431">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6432">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6432">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6433">三个字母，分别对应名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6433">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6434">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6434">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6435">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 为 A，10 月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6435">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6436">与出生日期对应的两个数字-为了区分性别，将 40 位添加到女士的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6436">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6437">四个数字，对应于特定的地区代码，该人的 (国家/地区代码用于国家/地区) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6437">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6438">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6438">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6439">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6440">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6441">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6442">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6442">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6443">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6443">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6444">找到 的  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6444">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6445">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6446">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6446">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6481">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6481">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6482">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6483">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6483">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6484">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6485">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6485">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6486">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6486">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6487">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6487">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6488">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6489">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6489">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6490">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6491">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6491">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6492">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6492">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6493">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6494">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6494">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6495">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6495">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6496">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6496">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6497">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6497">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6521">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6521">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6522">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6522">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6523">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6523">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6524">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6524">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6525">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6525">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6526">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6526">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6527">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6527">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6528">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6529">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6529">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6530">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6531">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6531">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6532">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6532">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6533">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6533">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6534">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6534">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6535">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6535">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6537">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6537">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6539">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6539">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6540">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6540">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6541">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6541">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6542">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6542">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6543">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6543">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6551">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6551">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6553">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6553">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6555">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6555">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6556">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6556">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6557">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6557">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6558">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6558">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6559">一个空格或 (划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6559">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6560">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6560">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6562">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6565">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6565">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6566">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6566">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6567">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6567">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6568">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6568">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6569">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6569">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6570">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6571">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6571">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6572">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6572">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6619">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6619">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6620">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6620">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6621">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6621">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6622">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6622">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6623">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6623">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6625">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6627">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6627">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6628">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6628">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6629">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6629">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6667">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6667">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6668">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6668">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6669">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6669">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6670">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6670">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6671">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6671">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6672">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6672">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6673">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6673">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6675">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6675">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6677">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6677">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6678">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6678">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6679">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6679">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6681">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6681">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6683">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6684">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6684">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6685">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6685">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6686">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6686">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6687">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6687">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6707">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6707">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6709">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6709">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6713">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6713">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6714">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6714">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6715">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6715">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6716">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6717">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6717">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6718">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6719">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6720">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6721">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6721">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6722">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6722">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6723">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6723">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6727">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6727">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6728">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6728">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6729">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6729">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6730">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6730">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6731">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6731">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6732">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6732">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6733">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6733">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6734">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6734">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6735">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6735">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6736">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6736">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6738">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6738">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6739">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6740">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6740">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6742">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6744">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6744">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6745">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6745">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6746">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6746">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6751">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6751">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6752">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6752">Passport #</span></span>
