- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6754">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6754">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6755">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6755">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6756">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6756">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6757">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6757">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6758">パスポパスポパスポ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6758">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6759">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6759">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6760">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6760">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6761">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6761">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6762">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6762">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6763">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6763">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6765">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6765">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6767">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6767">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6768">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6768">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6769">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6769">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6770">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6770">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6771">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6772">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6772">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6773">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6774">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6774">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6775">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6775">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6776">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6776">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6777">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6777">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6778">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6778">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6779">居住地卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6779">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6780">居住卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6780">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6781">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6781">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6782">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6782">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6783">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6783">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6784">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6784">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6785">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6785">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6786">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6786">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6787">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6787">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6788">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6788">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6789">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6789">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6790">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6791">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6791">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6792">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6793">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6793">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6794">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6794">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6795">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6795">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6796">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6796">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6797">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6797">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6798">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6798">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6799">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6799">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6800">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6800">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6801">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6801">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6802">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6802">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6803">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6803">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6804">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6804">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6805">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6805">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6806">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6806">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6807">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6807">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6808">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6808">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6810">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6810">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6811">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6812">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6812">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6813">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6813">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6814">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6814">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6815">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6815">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6816">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6816">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6817">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6818">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6819">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6820">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6821">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6821">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6822">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6822">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6823">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6823">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6824">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6824">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6825">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6825">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6846">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6846">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6848">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6848">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6849">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6850">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6850">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6851">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6851">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6852">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6852">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6853">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6854">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6854">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6855">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6856">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6857">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6857">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6858">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6858">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6983">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6983">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6984">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6985">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6985">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6986">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6987">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6987">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6988">11 个数字和连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6988">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6989">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6989">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6990">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6990">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6991">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"、20 世纪对应"1"和"21 世纪") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6991">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6992">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6992">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6993">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6993">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6994">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6994">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6995">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6995">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-6996">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6996">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6997">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-6998">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6998">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-6999">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-6999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7000">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7000">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7001">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7001">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7002">找到 的  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7002">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7003">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7004">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7004">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7067">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7067">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7068">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7069">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7069">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7070">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7071">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7071">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7072">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7072">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7073">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7073">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7075">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7075">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7077">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7077">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7078">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7078">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7079">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7079">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7080">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7080">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7081">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7082">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7082">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7083">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7083">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7106">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7106">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7108">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7108">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7110">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7110">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7111">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7112">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7113">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7114">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7115">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7116">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7241">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7241">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7242">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7242">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7243">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7243">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7244">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7244">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7245">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7245">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7246">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7246">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7247">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7247">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7248">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7249">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7249">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7250">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7251">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7251">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7252">一个数字 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7252">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7253">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7253">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7254">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7254">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7255">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7255">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7256">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7256">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7257">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7257">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7258">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7258">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7259">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7259">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7260">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7260">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7261">找到 的  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7261">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7262">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7263">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7263">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7298">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7298">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7299">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7300">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7300">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7301">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7302">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7302">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7303">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7304">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7304">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7305">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7306">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7306">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7307">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7307">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7308">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7308">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7309">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7309">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7310">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7311">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7311">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7312">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7312">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7332">百度达驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7332">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7333">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7334">6 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7334">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7335">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7336">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7336">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7337">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7338">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7338">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7339">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7340">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7340">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7341">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7341">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7342">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7342">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7466"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7466">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7467">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7468">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7469">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7470">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7471">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7472">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7474">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7474">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7475">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7476">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7476">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7477">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7477">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7478">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7478">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7480">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7480">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7482">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7482">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7483">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7483">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7484">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7484">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7485">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7486">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7486">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7509">百里达护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7509">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7511">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7511">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7512">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7512">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7513">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7513">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7514">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7514">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7515">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7515">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7516">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7516">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7517">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7517">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7518">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7518">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7519">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7519">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7520">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7520">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7521">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7521">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7522">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7522">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7523">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7523">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7555">阿比塞卡 (非自然人的身份证号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7555">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7556">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7556">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7557">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7557">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7558">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7558">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7559">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7559">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7560">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7560">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7561">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7561">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7562">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7563">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7564">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7564">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7565">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7565">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7566">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7566">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7567">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7569">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7571">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7571">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7572">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7572">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7573">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7574">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7574">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7575">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7575">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7615">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7615">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7617">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7617">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7618">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7619">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7619">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7620">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7620">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7621">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7622">双字母的出生日期位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7622">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7623">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7623">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7624">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7624">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7625">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7625">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7627">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7629">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7630">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7630">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7631">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7631">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7658">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7658">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7660">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7660">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7662">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7662">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7663">两个字符 (数字或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7663">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7664">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7664">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7665">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7665">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7666">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7666">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7667">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7667">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7669">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7671">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7672">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7672">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7673">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7797">马耳他身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7797">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7798">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7798">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7799">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7799">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7800">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7800">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7801">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7801">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7802">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7802">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7803">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7803">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7805">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7805">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7806">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7807">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7807">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7808">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7808">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7809">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7809">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7811">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7811">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7813">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7814">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7814">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7815">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7815">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7816">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7816">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7817">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7817">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7823">kodiċi数字 personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7823">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7824">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7824">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7825">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7825">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7826">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7826">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7827">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7827">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7828">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7828">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7829">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7829">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7830">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7830">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7831">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7831">unique identification number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7834">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7834">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7835">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7836">七个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7836">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7837">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7837">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7838">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7838">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7839">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7840">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7840">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7841">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7842">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7843">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7843">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7844">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7844">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7845">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7845">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7846">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7847">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7848">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7868">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7868">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7869">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7870">对于马耳他语：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7870">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7871">指定模式中的七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7871">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7872">非马耳他语公民和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7872">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7873">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7873">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7875">马耳他语：七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7875">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7876">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7876">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7877">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7877">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7878">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7878">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7879">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7879">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7880">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7881">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7881">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7882">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7883">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7884">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7884">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7885">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7885">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7886">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7886">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7887">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7887">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7920">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7920">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7922">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7922">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7924">八个九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7924">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7925">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7925">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7926">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7926">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7927">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7927">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7928">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7928">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7929">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7929">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7930">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7931">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7933">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7933">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7934">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7934">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7935">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7935">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7936">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7960">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7960">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7961">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7962">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7962">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7963">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7963">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7964">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7964">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7965">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7966">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-7967">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-7968">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7969">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7969">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-7970">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-7970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
