## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8098">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8098">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8099">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8099">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8100">九个字母或数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8100">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8101">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8101">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8102">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8102">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8103">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8104">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8104">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8105">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8106">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8107">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8107">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8108">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8108">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8109">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8109">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8110">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8111">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8111">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8112">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8130">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8130">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8131">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8132">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8132">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8133">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8133">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8134">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8134">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8135">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8135">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8136">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8136">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8137">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8138">九个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8138">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8139">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8140">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8140">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8141">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8142">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8142">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8143">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8144">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8145">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8145">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8146">找到 的  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8147">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8147">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8148">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8148">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8186">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8186">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8187">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8187">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8188">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8188">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8189">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8189">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8190">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8190">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8191">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8191">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8192">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8192">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8193">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8193">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8194">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8194">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8195">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8195">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8196">14 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8196">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8197">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8197">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8198">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8198">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8199">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8199">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8200">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8200">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8201">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8201">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8202">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8202">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8203">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8203">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8204">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8205">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8206">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8207">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8208">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8208">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8209">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8209">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8210">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8210">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8211">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8211">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8212">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8212">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8213">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8213">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8214">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8214">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8216">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8216">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8217">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8217">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8218">btw n与mer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8218">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8220">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8220">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8221">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8221">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8222">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8222">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8223">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8223">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8224">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8224">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8225">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8225">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8226">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8226">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8228">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8228">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8230">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8230">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8231">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8231">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8232">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8233">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8233">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8234">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8234">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8235">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8235">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8236">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8236">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8237">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8237">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8238">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8238">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8239">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8239">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8240">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8240">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8241">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8241">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8242">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8242">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8243">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8243">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8244">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8244">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8245">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8245">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8246">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8246">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8254">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8254">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8255">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8255">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8256">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8256">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8257">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8257">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8258">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8258">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8259">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8259">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8260">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8260">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8261">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8261">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8262">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8262">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8263">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8263">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8264">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8264">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8265">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8265">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8266">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8266">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8268">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8270">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8271">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8271">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8272">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8272">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8273">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8274">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8274">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8341">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8341">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8342">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8342">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8343">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8343">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8344">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8344">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8345">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8345">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8346">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8346">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8347">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8347">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8348">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8349">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8349">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8350">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8351">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8351">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8352">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8352">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8353">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8353">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8354">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8354">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8355">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8355">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8356">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8356">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8357">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8358">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8358">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8359">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8360">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8361">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8361">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8362">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8362">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8363">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8363">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8364">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8364">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8366">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8366">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8373">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8373">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8375">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8375">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8376">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8377">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8377">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8378">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8378">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8379">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8379">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8381">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8383">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8384">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8384">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8385">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8385">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8386">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8386">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8388">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8388">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8389">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8389">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8390">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8390">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8391">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8391">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8392">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8392">NHI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8394">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8394">Health</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8395">处理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8395">treatment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8396">National Health Index Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8396">National Health Index Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8397">nhi number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8397">nhi number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8398">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8398">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8399">NHI#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8399">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8400">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8400">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8401">National Health Index Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8401">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8402">National Health Index#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8402">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8403">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8403">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8404">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8404">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8405">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8405">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8406">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8406">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8407">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8407">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8408">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8408">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8409">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8409">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8411">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8411">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8412">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8413">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8413">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8414">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8415">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8415">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8416">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8417">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8417">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8418">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8418">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8419">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8420">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8421">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8422">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8423">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8423">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8424">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8424">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8425">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8425">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8426">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8426">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8427">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8429">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8429">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8430">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8430">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8431">social一号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8431">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8432">social 时号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8432">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8433">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8433">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8434">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8434">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8436">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8436">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8437">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8438">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8438">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8439">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8439">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8440">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8440">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8441">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8441">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8442">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8443">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8443">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8444">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8445">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8445">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8446">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8446">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8447">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8447">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8448">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8448">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8449">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8450">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8450">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8451">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8453">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8453">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8457">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8457">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8458">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8458">Personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8460">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8460">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8462">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8462">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8463">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8464">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8464">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8465">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8465">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8466">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8466">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8467">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8467">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8468">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8468">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8469">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8469">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8470">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8471">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8472">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8473">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8474">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8474">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8475">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8475">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8476">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8476">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8477">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8477">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8479">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8479">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8480">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8480">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8482">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8482">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8484">14 个数字，包含两个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8484">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8486">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8486">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8487">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8487">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8488">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8488">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8489">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8489">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8490">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8490">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8491">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8491">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8492">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8493">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8493">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8494">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8495">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8495">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8496">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8496">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8497">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8497">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8621">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8621">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8623">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8623">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8625">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8625">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8627">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8627">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8629">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8630">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8630">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8631">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8631">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8632">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8632">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8633">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8633">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8634">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8634">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8635">）Osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8635">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8636">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8636">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8637">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8637">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8638">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8638">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8639">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8639">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8640">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8640">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8641">的一个功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8641">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8642">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8642">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8643">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8643">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8645">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8645">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8646">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8647">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8647">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8648">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8648">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8649">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8649">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8651">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8653">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8654">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8654">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8655">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8655">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8656">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8657">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8657">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8658">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8658">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8659">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8659">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8660">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8660">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8661">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8661">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8662">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8662">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8663">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8663">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8664">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8664">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8665">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8665">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8666">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8666">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8667">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8667">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8668">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8668">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8669">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8669">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8670">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8670">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8671">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8671">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8672">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8672">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8673">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8673">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8675">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8675">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8677">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8677">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8678">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8679">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8680">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8681">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8681">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8682">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8682">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8683">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8683">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8684">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8684">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8685">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8685">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8686">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8686">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8687">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8687">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8688">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8688">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8689">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8689">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8690">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8690">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8691">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8691">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8692">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8692">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8693">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8693">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8694">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8694">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8695">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8695">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8696">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8696">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8697">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8697">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8718">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8718">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8719">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8719">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8720">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8720">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8721">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8721">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8722">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8722">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8723">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8723">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8724">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8724">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8725">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8726">9 位数字或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8726">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8727">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8728">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8728">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8729">九个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8729">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8730">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8730">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8731">hyphen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8731">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8732">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8732">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8733">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8734">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8735">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8736">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8737">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8737">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8738">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8738">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8739">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8739">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8740">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8740">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8745">统计 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8745">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8746">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8746">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8750">公司 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8750">company id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8754">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8754">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8755">numerstatystyczny#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8755">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8757">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8757">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8758">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8758">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8759">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8759">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8760">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8760">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8761">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8761">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8762">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8762">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8763">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8763">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8765">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8765">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8767">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8767">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8768">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8769">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8769">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8770">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8771">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8772">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8772">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8773">找到 的  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8773">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8803">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8803">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8805">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8805">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8806">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8807">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8807">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8808">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8808">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8809">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8809">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8810">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8810">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8811">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8811">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8812">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8812">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8813">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8813">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8814">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8814">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8815">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8815">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>
