## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8833">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8833">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8834">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8835">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8835">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8836">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8837">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8837">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8838">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8838">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8839">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8839">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8840">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8840">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8841">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8841">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8842">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8842">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8843">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8843">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8844">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8844">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8845">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8845">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8846">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8846">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8847">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8847">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8848">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8848">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8849">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8850">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8850">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8851">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8852">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8852">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8853">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8853">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8854">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8854">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8986">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8986">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8987">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8988">一个字母后跟 6 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8988">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8989">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8990">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8990">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8991">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8991">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8992">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8992">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8993">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8994">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8994">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-8995">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-8996">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8996">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8997">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8997">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8998">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8998">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-8999">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-8999">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9000">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9000">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9001">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9001">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9002">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9002">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9029">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9029">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9030">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9031">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9031">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9032">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9032">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9033">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9033">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9034">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9034">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9035">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9035">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9036">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9036">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9037">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9037">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9038">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9039">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9039">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9040">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9041">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9041">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9042">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9042">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9043">找到 的  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9043">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9044">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9044">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9045">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9045">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9046">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9046">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9047">Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9047">Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9055">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9055">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9070">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9070">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9071">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9072">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9072">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9073">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9074">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9074">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9075">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9075">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9076">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9076">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9077">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9077">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9078">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9078">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9079">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9079">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9080">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9080">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9081">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9081">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9082">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9082">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9210">使用 CNP (罗马尼亚个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9210">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9211">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9212">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9213">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9214">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9215">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9216">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9218">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9218">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9219">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9220">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9220">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9221">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9221">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9222">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9222">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9223">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9223">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9224">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9225">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9225">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9226">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9227">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9228">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9228">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9229">找到 的  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9229">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9230">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9231">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9231">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9282">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9282">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9284">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9284">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9285">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9286">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9286">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9287">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9288">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9288">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9289">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9290">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9290">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9291">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9291">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9292">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9292">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9293">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 2 月/2 月 10) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9293">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9294">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9295">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9295">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9296">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9296">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9297">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9297">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9298">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9298">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9299">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9299">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9300">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9300">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9301">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9301">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9314">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9314">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9315">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9316">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9317">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9318">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9319">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9320">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9322">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9322">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9323">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9324">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9324">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9325">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9325">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9326">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9326">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9327">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9327">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9328">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9328">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9329">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9329">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9330">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9331">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9331">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9332">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9332">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9333">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9333">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9334">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9334">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9335">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9335">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9352">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9352">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9353">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9353">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9354">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9354">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9355">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9355">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9356">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9356">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9357">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9357">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9358">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9358">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9359">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9360">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9360">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9361">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9362">九位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9362">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9363">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9363">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9364">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9364">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9365">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9365">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9366">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9367">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9367">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9368">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9369">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9369">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9370">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9370">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9371">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9371">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9388">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9388">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9389">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9389">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9390">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9390">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9391">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9391">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9392">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9392">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9393">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9393">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9394">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9394">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9395">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9395">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9396">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9397">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9397">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9398">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9398">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9399">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9399">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9400">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9400">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9403">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9403">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9404">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9404">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9405">新加坡国家注册身份证号码 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9405">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9406">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9406">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9407">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9407">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9408">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9408">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9409">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9409">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9410">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9410">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9411">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9412">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9412">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9413">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9414">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9414">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9415">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9416">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9417">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9417">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9418">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9418">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9419">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9419">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9420">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9421">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9421">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9422">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9422">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9423">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9423">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9424">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9424">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9425">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9425">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9426">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9426">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9427">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9427">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9428">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9428">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9429">Foreign Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9429">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9430">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9430">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9431">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9431">身份证</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9433">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9433">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9434">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9434">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9435">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9435">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9436">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9437">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9437">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9438">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9438">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9439">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9439">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9440">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9441">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9441">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9442">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9443">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9443">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9444">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9444">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9445">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9445">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9571">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9571">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9572">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9573">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9574">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9575">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9576">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9577">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9578">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9579">九个或十个数字，包含可选反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9579">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9580">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9580">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9581">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9581">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9582">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9582">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9583">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9583">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9584">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9584">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9585">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9586">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9587">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9588">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9588">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9589">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9589">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9590">找到 的  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9590">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9591">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9591">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9592">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9592">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9639">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9639">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9641">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9641">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9643">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9643">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9644">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9645">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9646">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9647">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9647">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9648">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9648">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9649">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9650">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9651">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9651">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9652">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9652">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9653">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9675">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9675">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9676">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9677">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9677">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9678">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9679">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9679">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9681">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9681">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9683">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9684">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9684">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9685">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9685">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9812">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9812">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9813">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9813">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9814">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9814">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9815">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9815">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9816">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9816">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9817">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9817">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9818">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9818">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9820">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9820">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9822">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9822">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9823">对应于出生日期的七个数字 (DDMMLLL) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9823">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9824">两个数字，对应于出生日期"50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9824">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9825">三个数字，分别对应同一天男性的性别和序列号组合 (000-499 和 500-999（对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9825">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9826">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9826">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9827">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9828">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9829">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9830">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9830">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9831">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9831">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9832">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9832">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9833">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9834">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9834">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9862">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9862">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9863">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9864">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9864">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9865">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9866">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9866">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9867">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9867">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9868">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9868">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9869">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9869">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9870">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9871">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9871">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9872">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9873">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9873">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9874">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9874">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9875">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9875">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9876">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9876">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9877">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9878">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9878">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9879">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9879">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9891">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9891">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9892">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9892">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9893">个tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9893">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9894">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9894">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9902">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9902">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9903">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9904">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9905">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9906">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9907">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9908">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9910">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9910">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9912">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9912">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9913">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9913">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9914">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9914">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9915">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9916">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9916">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9917">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9918">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9918">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9919">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9919">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9920">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9920">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9921">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9922">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9922">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9946">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9946">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9947">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9948">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9948">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9949">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9950">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9950">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9951">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9951">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9952">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9952">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9953">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9953">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9954">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9954">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9955">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9955">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9956">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9957">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9958">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9959">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9960">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9960">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9961">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9961">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9962">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9962">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9963">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9963">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9968">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9968">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9970">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9970">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9971">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9972">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9972">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9973">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9973">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9974">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9974">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9975">一个数字，由世纪和性别决定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9975">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9976">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9976">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9977">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9977">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9978">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9978">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9979">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9980">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9980">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9981">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9982">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9982">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9983">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9983">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9984">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9984">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9985">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9985">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9986">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9987">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9987">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9988">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9988">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9989">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9989">Keywords</span></span>
