- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9994">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9994">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-9995">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9995">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9996">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9996">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9997">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-9998">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9998">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-9999">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10000">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10000">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10001">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10001">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10002">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10002">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10003">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10003">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10004">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10004">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10005">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10005">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10006">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10006">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10007">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10007">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10008">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10008">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10009">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10009">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10010">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10010">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10144">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10144">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10145">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10145">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10146">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10146">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10147">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10147">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10148">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10148">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10149">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10149">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10150">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10150">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10152">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10152">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10153">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10154">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10154">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10155">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10155">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10156">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10156">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10157">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10157">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10159">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10159">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10161">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10162">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10162">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10163">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10163">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10164">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10165">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10165">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10189">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10189">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10191">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10191">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10192">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10193">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10193">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10194">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10194">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10195">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10195">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10196">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10196">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10197">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10198">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10198">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10199">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10200">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10200">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10201">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10201">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10202">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10202">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10203">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10203">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10204">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10204">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10205">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10205">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10206">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10235">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10235">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10237">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10237">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10238">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10239">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10239">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10240">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10240">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10241">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10241">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10242">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10242">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10243">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10243">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10244">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10244">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10246">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10246">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10248">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10249">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10249">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10250">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10250">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10251">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10251">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10252">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10253">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10253">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10254">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10263">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10263">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10264">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10264">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10265">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10265">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10266">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10266">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10267">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10267">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10268">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10268">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10269">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10269">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10271">七个或八个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10271">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10272">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10273">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10273">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10274">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10274">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10275">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10275">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10276">没有西班牙国家身份证的非常驻 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10276">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10277">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10277">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10278">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10278">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10279">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10279">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10280">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童的常驻 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10280">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10281">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10281">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10282">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10282">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10283">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10283">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10284">具有一位用户标识号的百位用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10284">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10285">一个小写字母，"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10285">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10286">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10286">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10287">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10287">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10288">没有标识号的百分卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10288">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10289">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10289">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10290">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10290">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10291">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10291">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10292">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10293">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10293">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10294">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10295">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10295">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10296">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10296">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10297">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10297">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10298">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10299">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10299">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10330">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10330">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10332">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10332">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10333">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10334">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10334">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10335">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10335">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10336">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10336">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10337">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10337">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10338">任何不是美元符号的字符 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10338">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10339">7-128 个字符的任意组合，这些字符不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10339">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10340">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10340">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10342">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10344">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10344">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10345">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10345">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10346">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10346">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10347">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10347">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10348">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10348">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10349">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10349">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10351">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10351">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10352">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10352">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10353">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10353">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10354">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10354">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10355">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10355">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10356"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10356">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10357">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和一个星号 (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10357">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10358">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10358">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10359">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10359">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10360">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10360">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10361">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10361">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10362">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10362">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10376">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10376">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10377">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10378">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10378">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10379">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10380">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10380">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10381">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10381">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10382">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10382">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10383">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10383">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10384">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10385">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10385">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10386">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10388">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10388">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10389">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10522">瑞典国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10522">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10524">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10524">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10525">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10526">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10526">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10527">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10527">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10528">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10528">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10529">可选参数"-"或"+" () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10529">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10530">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10530">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10531">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10532">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10533">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10534">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10534">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10535">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10535">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10536">找到的 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10536">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10537">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10538">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10538">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10539">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10539">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10540">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10540">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10559">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10559">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10560">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10561">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10561">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10562">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10563">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10563">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10564">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10565">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10565">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10566">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10567">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10568">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10568">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10569">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10569">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10570">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10570">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10571">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10572">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10572">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10573">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10573">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10609">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10609">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10610">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10610">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10611">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10611">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10612">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10612">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10613">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10613">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10614">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10614">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10615">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10615">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10617">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10617">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10618">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10619">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10619">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10620">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10620">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10621">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10621">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10622">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10622">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10623">对于 1990 以前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或出生日期的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10623">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10624">第九个位置的数字表示性别（男性为奇数或偶数）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10624">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10625">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10625">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10627">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10629">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10630">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10630">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10631">找到 的  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10631">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10632">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10632">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10633">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10633">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10659">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10659">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10661">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10661">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10663">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10663">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10664">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10664">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10665">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10665">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10666">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10666">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10667">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10667">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10668">BBAN (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10668">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10670">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10672">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10673">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10673">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10674">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10674">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10711">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10711">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10712">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10712">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10713">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10713">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10714">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10714">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10715">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10715">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10716">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10716">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10717">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10717">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10719">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10719">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10721">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10721">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10722">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10722">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10723">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10723">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10724">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10724">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10725">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10725">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10726">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10726">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10727">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10727">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10728">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10728">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10729">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10730">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10731">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10732">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10732">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10733">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10733">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10734">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10734">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10735">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10735">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10736">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10736">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10745">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10745">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10746">个人标识号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10746">personal identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10747">insuranceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10747">insuranceno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10748">uniqueidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10748">uniqueidno#</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10757">台湾国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10757">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10758">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10759">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10759">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10760">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10761">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10761">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10762">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10762">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10763">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10763">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10764">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10764">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10766">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10768">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10769">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10769">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10770">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10770">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10771">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10772">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10773">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10773">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10774">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10774">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10776">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10776">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10778">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10778">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10779">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10779">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10780">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10780">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10781">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10781">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10782">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10782">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10783">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10783">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10784">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10784">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10785">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10785">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10786">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10786">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10787">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10787">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10789">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10789">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10790">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10790">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10791">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10791">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10792">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10793">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10793">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10794">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10794">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10795">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10795">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10796">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10796">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10797">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10797">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10798">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10798">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10799">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10799">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10800">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10800">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10802">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10804">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10804">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10805">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10805">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10806">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10806">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10817">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10817">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10819">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10819">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10820">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10821">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10821">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10822">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10822">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10823">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10823">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10824">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10825">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10825">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10826">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10827">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10828">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10828">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10829">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10829">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10830">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10830">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10831">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10831">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10832">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10832">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10833">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10833">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10834">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10834">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10835">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10835">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10836">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10836">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10837">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10837">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10838">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10838">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10839">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10839">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10840">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10840">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10841">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10841">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10842">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10842">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10843">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10843">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10845">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10845">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10847">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10847">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10848">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10848">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10849">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10849">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10851">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10851">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10853">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10854">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10854">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10855">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10855">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10856">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10857">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10857">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10863">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10863">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10864">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10864">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10865">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10865">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10866">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10866">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10867">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10867">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10868">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10868">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10869">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10869">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10870">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10870">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10871">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10872">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10872">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10873">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10874">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10874">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10875">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10875">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10876">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10876">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10877">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10878">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10878">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10880">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10880">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10881">TC Kim且否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10881">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
