## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10885">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10885">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10886">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10886">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10887">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10888">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10888">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10889">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10890">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10890">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10891">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10891">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10892">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10892">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10893">日期格式 MMDDY 表示出生日期的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10893">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10894">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10894">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10895">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10895">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10896">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10896">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10897">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10898">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10899">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10900">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10901">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10901">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10902">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10902">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10903">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-10904">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10904">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10905">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10905">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-10906">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10906">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10907">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10907">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-10908">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-10908">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11027">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11027">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11028">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11028">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11029">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11030">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11030">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11031">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11032">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11032">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11033">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11034">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11034">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11035">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11036">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11037">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11037">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11038">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11038">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11039">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11039">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11040">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11040">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11041">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11041">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11042">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11042">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11043">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11043">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11044">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11044">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11045">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11045">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11046">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11046">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11047">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11048">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11048">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11049">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11050">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11050">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11051">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11051">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11052">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11052">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11053">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11053">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11054">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11054">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11055">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11055">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11056">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11057">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11058">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11059">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11059">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11060">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11060">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11061">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11061">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11062">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11062">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11063">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11063">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11064">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11064">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11065">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11066">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11066">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11067">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11067">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11068">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11068">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11069">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11069">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11070">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11070">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11071">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11071">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11072">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11072">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11073">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11073">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11074">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11074">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11075">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11075">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11076">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11076">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11077">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11077">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11078">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11078">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11079">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11079">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11080">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11080">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11081">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11081">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11082">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11082">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11083">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11083">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11084">NINO 保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11084">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11085">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11085">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11086">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11086">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11087">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11088">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11088">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11089">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11090">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11090">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11091">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11091">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11092">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11092">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11093">"A"、B、C 或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11093">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11094">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11094">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11095">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11095">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11096">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11096">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11097">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11097">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11098">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11098">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11099">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11099">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11100">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11100">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11101">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11101">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11102">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11102">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11103">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11103">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11104">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11105">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11106">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11107">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11108">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11108">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11109">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11109">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11110">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11111">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11111">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11133">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11133">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11134">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11134">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11135">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11135">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11136">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11136">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11137">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11137">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11138">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11138">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11139">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11139">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11140">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11140">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11142">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11142">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11144">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11144">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11145">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11145">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11146">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11146">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11147">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11147">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11148">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11148">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11149">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11149">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11150">找到 的  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11150">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11151">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11151">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11152">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11152">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11153">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11153">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11154">tax file</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11154">tax file</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11155">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11155">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11170">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11170">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11172">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11172">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11173">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11174">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11174">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11175">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11175">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11176">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11176">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11177">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11177">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11178">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11179">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11179">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11180">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11180">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11210">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11210">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11211">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11212">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11212">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11213">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11214">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11214">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11215">9 个数字，格式为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11215">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11216">9 个数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11216">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11217">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11217">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11218">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11218">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11219">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11219">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11220">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11221">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11221">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11222">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11222">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11223">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11223">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11224">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11224">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11225">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11225">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11226">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11226">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11227">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11227">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11228">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11228">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11326">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11326">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11328">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11328">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11330">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11330">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11331">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11331">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11332">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11332">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11333">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11333">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11334">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11334">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11335">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11335">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11336">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11336">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11337">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11337">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11338">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11338">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11339">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11339">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11340">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11340">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11341">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11341">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11342">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11342">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11343">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11344">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11344">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11345">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11346">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11347">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11347">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11348">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11348">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11349">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11350">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11350">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11351">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11351">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11352">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11352">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11353">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11353">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11354">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11354">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11355">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11355">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11356">将</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11356">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11357">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11357">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11358">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11358">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11359">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11359">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11360">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11360">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11361">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11361">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11362">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11362">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11363">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11363">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11364">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11364">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11365">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11365">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11366">已</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11366">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11367">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11367">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11368">SSN (美国社会保险) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11368">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11370">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11370">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11371">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11371">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11372">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11373">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11373">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11374">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11374">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11375">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11375">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11376">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11376">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11377">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11377">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11378">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11379">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11379">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11380">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11381">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11381">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11382">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11382">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11383">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11383">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11384">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11384">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11385">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11385">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11386">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11386">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11387">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11388">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11388">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11389">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11389">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11390">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11390">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11391">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11391">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11392">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11392">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11407">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11407">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11408">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11408">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11410">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11410">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11411">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11412">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11412">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11413">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11414">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11414">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11415">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11416">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11417">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11417">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11418">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11418">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11419">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11419">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11420">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11421">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11421">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11422">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11422">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11438">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11438">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11439">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11439">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11440">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11440">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11441">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11441">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11442">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11442">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11443">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11443">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11444">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11444">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11445">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11446">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11446">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11447">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11448">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11448">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11449">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11450">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11450">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11451">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11452">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11452">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11453">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11453">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11454">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11454">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11463">乌克兰护照国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11463">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11464">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11464">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11465">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11465">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11466">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11466">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11467">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11467">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11468">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11468">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11469">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11469">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11470">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11471">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11471">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11472">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11473">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11473">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11474">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11474">two letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11476">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11477">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11477">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11478">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9710e-11479">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11480">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11480">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11481">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11481">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11482">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11482">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="9710e-11483">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11483">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11487">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11487">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9710e-11488">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9710e-11488">номер паспорта</span></span>
